{"currentConversationId":"9264c4ef-aac0-43aa-b2fb-fdc76090c995","agentExecutionMode":"manual","isPanelCollapsed":true,"displayedAnnouncements":[],"conversations":{"0ffdfa09-9505-4dc8-bcae-90785463f722":{"id":"0ffdfa09-9505-4dc8-bcae-90785463f722","createdAtIso":"2025-10-30T09:16:04.126Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-10-30T09:16:04.126Z","chatHistory":[],"feedbackStates":{},"toolUseStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph"}]},"mentioned_items":[],"status":"draft"},"requestIds":[],"isPinned":false,"isShareable":false,"extraData":{"isAgentConversation":true,"hasAgentOnboarded":true,"hasDirtyEdits":false},"personaType":0},"9264c4ef-aac0-43aa-b2fb-fdc76090c995":{"id":"9264c4ef-aac0-43aa-b2fb-fdc76090c995","createdAtIso":"2025-10-30T09:16:04.196Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-10-30T09:16:14.503Z","chatHistory":[{"request_id":"d178b575-2bc3-4010-828e-23729323013f","uuid":"5518d4fb-9333-482a-88c1-909d59c527a4","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1761815764197,"seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"e139971c-380f-4e01-b17d-76dde08636cd","timestamp":"2025-10-30T09:16:14.507Z","request_message":"STATIC variable : Enoncé
Attendu
Vous devrez développer un programme qui prend en paramètre plusieurs lancers de
5 dés, analyse ces lancés pour identifier les figures possibles, retourne la somme
des points obtenus.
En cas de multiple figure dans un même lancé, seule la figure rapportant le plus de
points devra être prise en compte.
Les lancers utilisés par votre programme pourront être écrits en dur dans le code.
Figures possibles
Figure Description Points
Brelan 3 dés ont la même valeur 28
Carré 4 dés ont la même valeur 35
Full 1 brelan et 1 paire 30
Grande suite La valeur des 5 dés se suivent 40
YAMS 5 dés ont la même valeur 50
Chance Pas de figure Somme des 5 dès","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"}],"feedbackStates":{"temp-fe-917a9afe-4e0a-4e95-aa66-ff66bd08c79a":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""}},"toolUseStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph"}]},"status":"draft"},"requestIds":[],"isPinned":false,"isShareable":true,"extraData":{"isAgentConversation":false,"hasAgentOnboarded":true,"hasDirtyEdits":false,"baselineTimestamp":0},"personaType":0,"rootTaskUuid":"d964c44d-2b3d-4c3a-8519-841a51e938ae"}}}
